Frequently asked questions:

No. All orders are manually checked for fraud and security. This ensures reliability and safety for our clients.

No.

What are your resource limits per account.

1 CPU Core

What is your average support response time?

We usually respond within 60 minutes, sometimes within 90 minutes, depending on load and time of day!
